Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The feedback from GenAI sometimes did not make sense so it was unhelpful. My teachers always listened and provided comprehensible and applicable feedback I could use in my assignment.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: My teacher understood what I was asking about better.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI can be very helpful at home when you are unable to ask questions to your teacher, but should not always be trusted. The only time that GenAI's feedback has truly been helpful was for reducing wordcount in assignments.
